card_text: 1 Level 8 or lower "Magical Musket" monster$NIf this card is Link Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add "Magical Musket" Spells/Traps with different names from your Deck to your hand, up to the number of monsters your opponent controls.$N●Special Summon "Magical Musket" monsters with different names from your Deck, up to the number of Spells/Traps your opponent controls.$NYou can only use this effect of "Magical Musketeer Max" once per turn. During either player's turn, you can activate "Magical Musket" Spell/Trap Cards from your hand.
